stories.Title: The role of AI in science
stories.Description: The future of scientific research unfolds before us with AI as an indispensable visionary companion. However, former Google CEO, Eric Schmidt, emphasizes the importance of human expertise.
stories.Tweet: The role of AI in science 📦 The future of scientific research unfolds before us with AI as an indispensable visionary companion. However, former Google CEO, Eric Schmidt, emphasizes the importance of human expertise. #ai https://www.technologyreview.com/2023/07/05/1075865/eric-schmidt-ai-will-transform-science/

stories.Title: ChatGPT’s short-lived Bing integration
stories.Description: OpenAI has temporarily disabled ChatGPT's "Browse with Bing" feature as it inadvertently bypassed paywalls, committing to fixing the issue while keeping content owners in mind.
stories.Tweet: ChatGPT’s short-lived Bing integration 📦 OpenAI has temporarily disabled ChatGPT's "Browse with Bing" feature as it inadvertently bypassed paywalls, committing to fixing the issue while keeping content owners in mind. #chatgpt https://www.digitaltrends.com/computing/chatgpts-bing-browsing-feature-disabled-over-paywall-flaw/

stories.Title: AI’s latest job: Firefighter
stories.Description: Cal Fire, California's firefighting agency, integrates advanced technology to combat wildfires. AI-driven cameras autonomously spot smoke, liberating firefighters from constant surveillance.
stories.Tweet: AI’s latest job: Firefighter 📦 Cal Fire, California's firefighting agency, integrates advanced technology to combat wildfires. AI-driven cameras autonomously spot smoke, liberating firefighters from constant surveillance. #ai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/293442/20230705/cal-fire-uses-ai-detect-wildfires-without-human-eyes.htm

stories.Title: AI clashes with the public web
stories.Description: AI's impact on the public web raises concerns and debates. Companies seek to protect their data while users demand involvement and reward for their contributions.
stories.Tweet: AI clashes with the public web 📦 AI's impact on the public web raises concerns and debates. Companies seek to protect their data while users demand involvement and reward for their contributions. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/07/05/public-web-twitter-open-access-reddit

stories.Title: Add a touch of AI to your next vacation
stories.Description: AI-powered chatbots like ChatGPT are changing the travel game by providing personalized trip suggestions for travelers based on their preferences and who they're traveling with.
stories.Tweet: Add a touch of AI to your next vacation 📦 AI-powered chatbots like ChatGPT are changing the travel game by providing personalized trip suggestions for travelers based on their preferences and who they're traveling with. #ai https://time.com/6290940/ai-travel-industry/

stories.Title: In the blink of an eye…
stories.Description: The computing field is buzzing with the latest advancements from Google's Sycamore quantum computer. What would normally take 47 years for the fastest supercomputers, is accomplished in mere seconds.
stories.Tweet: In the blink of an eye… 📦 The computing field is buzzing with the latest advancements from Google's Sycamore quantum computer. What would normally take 47 years for the fastest supercomputers, is accomplished in mere seconds. #google https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/google-quantum-computer-supercomputers-47-years

stories.Title: Spotify’s CEO approach to preventive healthcare
stories.Description: Neko Health, the preventive healthcare startup he co-founded, has secured significant funding that provides the resources needed to expand beyond Sweden its revolutionary concept.

stories.Title: The final countdown
stories.Description: Ariane 5's last mission is about to begin. Don't miss the live webcast by Arianespace, and witness the culmination of decades of space exploration.

stories.Title: Smart, compact, and affordable
stories.Description: Stellantis has introduced the FIAT 600e. This compact electric SUV is perfect for urban living and outdoor adventures, with an affordable starting price that aims to rival the upcoming Volvo EX30.
